entry.title: $2488 // open concept kitchen +>+>and living room with natural light upstairs
entry.content:
One Month Free!


1 Bed / 2 Bath at MacDonough St in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Halsey St, Ralph Av. Elegant 1BR 2 full bath duplex apartment with super spacious king size bedroom with en suite bath downstairs, huge designer closets and access to a shared yard, spacious open concept kitchen and living room with natural light upstairs, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, built in microwave and laundry in building with beautiful finishes throughout. Easily walkable to the Halsey J or Ralph C. Neighborhood highlights include Manny's, Toad Style, Chez Oscar and Nana Ramen.

Contact Me directly at 34 seven 5695503 to schedule an appointment

entry.title: $2658 // AMAZING 2 BEDROOMS 2 BATHROOM DUPLEX*DISHWASHER*TERRACE*A,C TRAINS*
entry.content:
WOW WOW WOW
2 Bedrooms Duplex with 2 Full Bathrooms

With floor to ceiling windows natural light fills this condo-like retreat, while welcoming new residents to the edge of Bed Stuy.

-Master bed with private entry, private shower, and private rooftop space.
-Top of the line Kitchen Aid stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher, microwave
-Washer and dryer hookup
-Subway tile and marble finishes add style and exude class in two luxurious bathrooms.

Features
+ Duplex
+ Skyline Views
+ Private Rooftop
+ Private Entry
+ Central Air and Heat
+ Dishwasher
+ Designer Appliances

***1 Block from C Train

****Net Price****1.5 Months Free****18 Month****
